emerald_armor.json.description: Increases durability depending on base stats!

polished_armor.json.description: Toughness increased to the same level as %s.

soulbound_armor.json.description: You love your armor. Not even death can part you.

moretcon.extratrait2.json.flavorText: If embossment is so good why isn't there an embossment 2
moretcon.extratrait2.json.description: Embossed with the power of %s, obtaining some of its traits.

moretcon.modautocrit.json.description: Your tool will occasionally automatically crit targets.

moretcon.modcrushing.json.description: Your tool will deal some additional true damage.

moretcon.moddebug.json.description: Your tool logs info about itself in the chat. Typically used by ExistingEevee to debug tools.

oreexcavate.json.flavorText: Allows this tool to be used with OreExcavation

modifierDesc: Striking a spider with its own eyeball causes it to recoil in fear. Got a pest problem? Here is the solution. Kills bugs dead.
modifierEffects: - Deals massive damage to spiders and silverfish

beheading.json.description: Each level adds a 10% chance to get the enemies head on kill.
modifierDesc: Working an ender pearl and some obsidian on a weapon has the curious effect of separating the target's head from its body. Just a little off the top?
modifierEffects: - Adding more Obsidian and Ender Pearls increases the chance of decapitation

beheading_cleaver.json.description: Each level adds a 10% chance to get the enemies head on kill.

blasting.json.description: You can break non-effective blocks like normal blocks, but they might get destroyed.
modifierDesc: Blow up all the blocks! Make them go away FAST!
You can apply multiple levels to increase speed, but you probably lose all harvested blocks
modifierEffects: - AOE Tools harvest uneffective blocks too

modifierDesc: Adding a diamond to the edge of a tool makes it more resilient and increases what the tool can mine. Also makes a fetching fashion statement.
modifierEffects: - Mining level increased by one, up to Obsidian

emerald.json.description: Increases durability depending on base stats!
modifierDesc: Affixing an emerald to a tool's weakest point makes it especially resilient and fabulous. Villagers may also covet your tool, be wary.

extramodifier.json.description: Endeared with an Ender Dragon head, giving you an extra modifier.
modifierDesc: You're a seasoned adventurer, you've beaten the End, and you got your elytra. How about an extra modifier slot to show off how far you got in your world?
modifierEffects: - Makes good use of Ender Dragon heads

extratrait.json.description: Embossed with the power of %s, obtaining some of its traits.
modifierDesc: Take a tool part and emboss it onto the tool! It's like replacing the tool part, but better! The tool gets the traits of the part in addition to the already present ones (but not the stats).
modifierEffects: - Traits are equal to swapping the part
- The embossment is final and can't be changed

fiery.json.description: Bonus fire damage, sets your enemies on fire.
modifierDesc: Adding blaze powder to a tool gives it a fiery tinge. The weapon's edges look like embers. Sadly not bright enough to be a light source.
modifierEffects: - Deals additional fire damage on hit

fins.json.description: Attaching fins to the projectiles makes them travel like normal underwater.
modifierDesc: Let's take a fish... and strap it onto arrows. Of course! It makes them swim underwater! Now you can shoot stuff underwater!

fortify.json.description: Mining level increased to the same level as %s.
modifierDesc: Harder, better, faster, stronger! Applies the same mining level of the material used to the tool.
modifierEffects: - Mining Level depends on material used

glowing.json.description: Whenever it gets too dark your tool sacrifices a part of itself to light up your way.
modifierDesc: Some glowstone and a magical ender eye. Obviously this sees the light level.
modifierEffects: - Places a lightsource on low light level

harvestheight.json.description: Increases the height of the area affected by your tool. The effect is tool specific.
modifierDesc: Have you ever wished your tool could affect a higher area? Now it can!
modifierEffects: - Increases the height of the area affected

harvestwidth.json.description: Increases the width of the area affected by your tool. The effect is tool specific.
modifierDesc: Have you ever wished your tool could affect a wider area? Now it can!
modifierEffects: - Increases the width of the area affected

haste.json.description: The redstone impulse when using your tool motivates your tool to move even faster.
modifierDesc: Adding redstone to a tool seems to increase its speed. Redstones mining speed effect is more potent on slower tools.
Redstone. Crazy stuff, amiright?
modifierEffects: - Each redstone dust increases mining speed by a small amount

incognito.json.description: Hides modifiers for a clean look.
modifierDesc: It's more reality than illusion! For the seasoned tinkerer who aims for ingenious perks but a tidy appearance.
modifierEffects: - Makes good use of wet sponges

knockback.json.description: Teach things how to fly - the cool way.
modifierDesc: Attaching a piston to the tool and activating it at the right time seems to throw mobs further away.
modifierEffects: - Each piston increases the knockback distance

luck.json.description: You're getting all the nice things. And a lot of them.
modifierDesc: Encrusting lapis on tools is a gift to the gods of luck. They will bless your tool with great fortune and loot.
Has to be on the projectile for ranged weapons.
modifierEffects: - Tool use has a chance to increase the luck
- Adding more lapis only uses one modifier

mending_moss.json.description: Picked up XP is stored in the tool. It will slowly use up the XP to regenerate durability.
modifierDesc: Some moss has grown on the worn out edges of your tool. Enchanting it with some XP causes it to fuse with the tool, restoring it gradually.
modifierEffects: - Max. Amount stored increases with modifier level
- Slowly repairs the tool over time
- Has to be in hotbar or offhand to repair

necrotic.json.description: Hitting enemies returns health to you depending on damage dealt.
modifierDesc: Placing the bone of a Wither Skeleton on a tool gives it nefarious life-stealing powers.
modifierEffects: - Add more bones to increase the heal

reinforced.json.description: Each level adds a 20% chance to not use durability.
modifierDesc: Adding a reinforced plate to the tool seems to help with its durability, making it stronger.
modifierEffects: - Adds a chance to not consume durability
- Stacks with previous levels of Reinforced

sharpness.json.description: So sharp, it hurts to look at it.
modifierDesc: You can use Quartz to sharpen and hone the edge of weapons. The more Quartz is used the better you can sharpen the blade. Works with blunt items as well.

shulking.json.description: Hitting foes causes them to float away.
modifierDesc: Empower your tool with the ability of a Shulker. Hit enemies to render them powerless in midair.

silktouch.json.description: Mined blocks drop themselves instead of the usual items.
modifierDesc: Adding a large glob of gold and a bunch of string seems to give the tool silky-smooth properties.
I can't believe it's not butter!
modifierEffects: - Allows blocks to be harvested directly
- Not compatible with Luck or Auto-Smelt

modifierDesc: The raw power of consecrated soil empowers your weapon, smiting enemies from on high.
modifierEffects: - Deals massive damage to undead enemies

soulbound.json.description: You love your tool. Not even death can part you.
modifierDesc: A perfect match. You love your tool. Not even death can part you from it.
modifierEffects: - Tool remains in your inventory after death

webbed.json.description: Entangle your foes in cobwebs, slowing them.
modifierDesc: All those sticky spider webs have to be good for something. Slow your enemies with them!

toolDesc: The Arrows are deadly projectiles, fired from a bow. The crafted arrows contain multiple shots and can be picked back up.
Damage dealt depends on the bow as well as the arrows themselves. They offer a wide range of behaviors with different materials.
The Battlesign is an advance in weapon technology worthy of Zombie Pigmen everywhere. It's a defensive weapon which doubles as a shield.
Blocking gives increased damage reduction, reflecting a small portion of the damage and reflects any projectiles.
toolProperties: - Can be used as a shield

toolDesc: The Bolt is a heavy, armor penetrating projectile. Once loaded into a crossbow, they deal high amounts of damage while also penetrating half of the targets armor.
Damage dealt depends on the crossbow as well as the bolts themselves. The Bolt Crafting page explains how to craft the parts.
The Broadsword is a versatile weapon. It has average damage, allows to knock back enemies with a sweep attack all while keeping your other hand free.
Compatible with other offhand weapons or tools.
The Cleaver is a heavy offensive weapon. It has powerful strikes, but is difficult to wield.
Each killing blow has a chance to behead the foe. Off with their heads!
The Crossbow is a strong ranged weapon which needs to be loaded beforehand. Its bolts deal a lot of damage and pierce a part of the enemies armor. Crossbows gain extra benefits from bonus damage.
Loading is relatively slow, but often you only need one shot. You only need to land it.
toolProperties: - Needs to be loaded before firing

toolDesc: The Excavator is a broad digging tool. It harvests soil and snow in a wide range.
For when you need to dig a lot of graves.
toolProperties: - Effective on dirt, sand and gravel

toolDesc: The Frying Pan is a heavy weapon that uses sheer weight to impede foes. It possesses a natural knockback.
Holding right-click charges up a powerful blow, so powerful that it deals bonus damage, knocks enemies farther away and cooks any drops.
The Hammer is a broad mining tool. It harvests blocks in a wide range and is effective against undead.
It is optimal for mining out large areas and long mining trips.
The Hatchet is a basic chopping tool. It is effective on wood and leaves. Breaking leaves with it does not consume durability.
Using the hatchet in combat allows you to disable the shield of your opponent.
The Kama is a versatile farming tool, mowing down plants, tilling soil and shearing animals.
Right-clicking soil will till it. Right-clicking on crops or sugarcane will harvest and replant all fully grown plants in the area.
The Longbow is the perfect weapon to kill over a distance. It fires slowly, but packs a punch.
Perfect for abusing a positional advantage, you just need to nail the shot.
toolProperties: - Can use regular arrows, but they're less effective

toolDesc: The Longsword is an offensive weapon. It is often used for charging into battle at full speed. It is slower than the Broadsword but scales better with damage.
Holding right-click charges up a lunge, which allows you to perform a short jump.
The Lumber Axe is a broad chopping tool. It can fell entire trees or gather wood in a wide range.
A tree is only detected if it has leaves on top.
toolProperties: - Fells whole trees in one swoop

toolDesc: The Mattock is a precise multi-use tool. It is effective on wood, soil and plants.
It can create paths like shovels and deal respectable damage in combat.
toolProperties: - Effective on wood, soil and plants

toolDesc: The Pickaxe is a precise mining tool. It is effective on stone and ores.
It breaks blocks, OK?
The Rapier is a special weapon that relies on quick strikes to defeat (armored) foes. Each hit with the rapier partially bypasses the armor of the target.
Right-clicking performs a short backpedal, allowing you to quickly dodge incoming damage.
The Scythe is a broad reaping tool. It is effective on plants and attacks enemies in a wide range.
Right-clicking on crops or sugarcane harvests and replants all fully grown plants in the area.
The Shortbow is a fast and nimble option for ranged combat. It fires faster than its vanilla brother and also allows for faster movement, however this comes with the price of reduced damage.
If you're looking to turn your enemies into a pincushion, then the shortbow is for you.
toolProperties: - Can be used with vanilla arrows
- Can use regular arrows, but they're less effective

toolDesc: The Shovel is a precise digging tool. It is effective on dirt, sand, gravel and snow.
Right-clicking on grass or soil will create paths.
toolProperties: - Effective on dirt, sand and gravel

toolDesc: Shurikens are short ranged throwing weapon, thrown instantly. They can be used from the offhand too, and allow for a lot of control due to their fast speed.
toolProperties: - Can be thrown from the offhand

absorbent_armor.json.description: Your armor gets stronger in water and rain.

alien.json.description: ..as if they're changing! Maybe time will tell?

alien_armor.json.description: ..as if they're changing! Maybe time will tell?

amphibious_armor.json.description: Allows you to breath underwater for a limited time.

aquadynamic.json.description: The tool is unhindered by water and loves rainy evenings.

aquaspeed_armor.json.description: The armor is unhindered by water and loves rainy evenings.

aridiculous.json.description: The tool works better in hotter environments.

aridiculous_armor.json.description: The armor works better in hotter environments.

autoforge_armor.json.description: The armor repairs itself in fire.

bouncy_armor.json.description: Your armor tends to bounce around.

breakable.json.description: Projectiles have a 50% chance to break on impact.

calcic_armor.json.description: Milk rejuvenates both you and your armor.

cheap.json.description: Increases durability gained when repairing the tool.

cheapskate.json.description: Stone is bad. Your tool has less durability.

cheapskate_armor.json.description: Stone is bad. Your armor has less durability.

cheap_armor.json.description: Increases durability gained when repairing the armor.

coldblooded.json.description: Deal increased damage to targets at full health.

combustible_armor.json.description: Sets fire to surrounding creatures when ignited.

crumbling.json.description: The tool breaks soft blocks that don't need a tool faster.

dense.json.description: Your tool lasts longer when it has less durability.

dense_armor.json.description: Your armor lasts longer when it has less durability.

depthdigger.json.description: Your tool mines faster the deeper you mine.

dramatic_armor.json.description: Might save you in a pinch? Who knows!

duritos.json.flavorText: Doesn't taste as good as it sounds.
duritos.json.description: Your tool lasts longer ...most of the time.

duritos_ranch_armor.json.flavorText: Doesn't taste as good as it sounds.
duritos_ranch_armor.json.description: Your armor lasts longer...most of the time.

ecological.json.description: Renewable resources are so good, they regenerate by themselves!

ecological_armor.json.description: Renewable resources are so good, they regenerate by themselves!

enderference.json.description: Prevents Endermen from teleporting around for a short time.

enderport_armor.json.description: Might teleport you out of dangerous situations.

endspeed.json.description: Projectiles instantly travel to their destination.

featherweight_armor.json.description: You're so light, you take less fall damage.

flammable.json.description: Blocking blocks fire damage and getting hit sets the attacker on fire.

freezing.json.description: Successful hits slow your target more and more.

frostwalker_armor.json.description: Your feet are so cold, they freeze the water around you.

glowing_armor.json.description: Whenever it gets too dark, your boots sacrifice a part of themselves to light up your way.

hellish.json.description: Deal bonus damage to non-Nether mobs.

high_stride_armor.json.description: You can walk up higher steps.

holy.json.description: Deal bonus damage to undead enemies.

hovering.json.description: Projectiles move slower but don't mind gravity as much.

insatiable.json.description: During combat you deal more and more damage but also consume more and more durability.

jagged.json.description: Every point durability lost increases damage.

lightweight.json.description: Increases the overall speed of your tool when mining and attacking.

magnetic1_armor.json.description: Items can't help but be drawn to you.

magnetic2_armor.json.description: Items can't help but be drawn to you.

mending_armor.json.description: Picked up XP is stored in the armor. It will slowly use up the XP to regenerate durability.

momentum.json.description: Mining blocks increases your speed, as long as you keep going.

moretcon.aegis_incantamentum_armor.json.description: While wearing this armor, you will gain 10 seconds of resistance every 20 seconds.

moretcon.aerialflame.json.description: Your projectile will launch a pillar of flames down at your opponents.

moretcon.afterheal_armor.json.description: While wearing this armor, you will heal 0.5 hearts 1.5 seconds after taking damage.

moretcon.afterimage.json.description: Your tool will occasionally grant a free extra hit with no cooldown. This extra hit will do increased knockback and damage.

moretcon.approximate1.json.description: Your tool will gain a bit of aim-assist when fighting melee targets.

moretcon.approximate2.json.description: Your tool will gain a bit of aim-assist when fighting melee targets.

moretcon.autoloading.json.description: Your tool will fire full auto with increased drawspeed.

moretcon.blighted.json.description: Your tool will deal additional damage for every level of debuff on a target.

moretcon.blightshield_armor.json.description: You are immune to projectiles when below 50% hp while wearing this armor.

moretcon.blinkdrawn.json.description: Your tool can be loaded instantly with no delay, however will consume more durability per shot as well as dealing significantly less damage.

moretcon.bloodgodsblessing.json.description: Consecutive attacks with this tool will give stronger and stronger buffs

moretcon.bottomsend.json.description: Your tool will be able to disrupt and mine the crystaline structure of bedrock and certain bedrock ores.

moretcon.burning.json.description: Your tool can set enemies on fire... sometimes....

moretcon.burning_thorns_armor.json.description: Your armor will set attackers ablaze.

moretcon.cold_fire.json.description: Burns your targets and freezes them in place.

moretcon.cold_fire_armor.json.description: Your armor will set attackers ablaze with cold fire.

moretcon.cryogenics.json.description: Your tool will frost enemies on hit, granting Slowness, Mining Fatigue, and Resistance to your targets. You also deal increased damage to unfrosted targets.

moretcon.darkened.json.description: Your tool is more effective whilst in darkness.

moretcon.dematerializing.json.flavorText: Your intermolecular cohesion privileges have been revoked :3
moretcon.dematerializing.json.description: Your tool will atomize arrows and turn them into a beam that obliterates anything in its path when fully drawn.

moretcon.electrified.json.description: Your tool can build up and eventually discharge damaging amounts of electric current in targets.

moretcon.essential_obliteration1.json.description: This tool will slowly charge up. You can expend 10 charges by sneaking and mining a block with extended reach to cause a large mining explosion.

moretcon.etheralharvest.json.description: Your tool will be able able to mine non-tangible blocks typically found in the end.

moretcon.ethereal_tangibility_armor.json.description: While wearing this armor, you can stand on (but not sneak on) ethereal blocks.

moretcon.eulers_wrath.json.flavorText: Hes upset because you rounded it to 3...
moretcon.eulers_wrath.json.description: Your tool is approximately 2.718x as effective, approximately 1 in 2.718 times.

moretcon.evasive_armor1.json.description: Your armor will occasionally fully nullify damage.

moretcon.evasive_armor2.json.description: Your armor will occasionally fully nullify damage.

moretcon.fireslime.json.description: Your tool will rapidly regenerate overslime and function significantly better while the you are on fire.

moretcon.fissile_armor.json.description: Your armor will detonate when your health is below 25%, dealing massive damage to nearby targets.

moretcon.flashbang.json.description: Your bomb will blind and stun any targets caught in its blast.

moretcon.galvanized_armor.json.description: Your armor will grant you additional attack damage.

moretcon.gravitating_armor.json.description: While wearing this armor, you are resistant to fall damage and will fall faster, leaving a devastating impact when falling from a great height.

moretcon.hailshot1.json.description: Your projectile will become empowered on kill. Sneaking and shooting while empowered will cause your next shot to cause an icy explosion on impact.

moretcon.hardcore.json.flavorText: Tool part with hard core isn't hardcore. Ironic isnt it?
moretcon.hardcore.json.description: Your tool mines faster as its damaged.

moretcon.haunted.json.description: Your tool can ignite your targets in an otherworldly fire that bypasses invulnerability frames.

moretcon.haunted_armor.json.description: Your armor will set attackers ablaze with haunted flames.

moretcon.helpful_radiation.json.flavorText: oi i can count to 10 on one hand
moretcon.helpful_radiation.json.description: Your tool deals mutates you in a way that makes you stronger and your opponents filled with harmful potion effects.

moretcon.hypergravity.json.description: Your tool will pull entities back instead of knocking them forwards.

moretcon.hyperheat.json.description: Your tool will set opponents on fire. This fire will do additional multiplicative damage depending on your tool's original damage

moretcon.immolating_armor.json.flavorText: Man, my food isnt warm at all...
moretcon.immolating_armor.json.description: the plate:\\nYour armor will gain a 75% increase in armor and toughness, but you will take lava damage every 5 seconds.

moretcon.impact_detonated.json.flavorText: How â€™bout a nice cup of LIBER-TEA?
moretcon.impact_detonated.json.description: Your bomb will detonate instantly when hitting a target, but will deal 25% less damage.

moretcon.kinetic_battery1.json.description: Your tool will store kinetic energy whenever you take or deal damage. Attacking while shifting to release the energy all at once.

moretcon.leeching.json.description: Your tool will heal you 10% of the dealt damage every approximately 3 hits

moretcon.liquid.json.description: Your tool will break faster in hot enviroments, but will do more damage there.

moretcon.liquid_armor.json.description: Your armor get stronger in cold biomes, but rapidly melt in hotter ones.

moretcon.luminescent.json.description: Your tool will glow. Purely decorative.

moretcon.macrocrystaline.json.description: Your tool loves perfect powers of 2... especially when its durability remaining is greater than that of one...

moretcon.magical.json.description: Your tool will deal massive magical knockback occasionally.

moretcon.magically_reactive.json.description: Your tool is stronger towards enchanted targets.

moretcon.mirroring.json.flavorText: Twice the pride, double the fall
moretcon.mirroring.json.description: Your projectile will gain the traits of your launcher.

moretcon.mutant_armor.json.flavorText: HULK WANT MORE negative status effect NOW!
moretcon.mutant_armor.json.description: Your armor will allow you to benefit from select negative status effects.

moretcon.offense.json.description: Your tool will automatically attack any targets blocked.

moretcon.overcast.json.description: Overslime provides twice as much durability with this trait.

moretcon.overdrive.json.description: Your tool does apply significantly less invulnerability frames.

moretcon.overlasting_armor.json.flavorText: I-frames ain't got nothin' on me
moretcon.overlasting_armor.json.description: While wearing this armor, you have 250ms of additional I-frames.

moretcon.overload_armor1.json.description: Your armor will detonate after taking enough damage, dealing massive damage to nearby targets.

moretcon.overslime1.json.description: Your tool consumes overslime instead of durability, until it runs out! Not friendly towards tools lacking slime.

moretcon.penetrant.json.flavorText: bigger they are, harder they fall
moretcon.penetrant.json.description: Your tool is stronger towards armored targets.

moretcon.plasmatic.json.description: Your tool will be able to hit everything within your reach distance, including behind blocks and other entities.

moretcon.plasma_missiles.json.description: Your tool will fire tracking missiles on hit. The missiles have a 50% chance to proc traits.

moretcon.plasma_shield_armor.json.flavorText: A step away from lunar Transcendence!
moretcon.plasma_shield_armor.json.description: You gain some absorption while wearing this armor. Not taking damage for 15 seconds rapidly regenerates absorption. Your armor also more effective when absorption hearts are present.

moretcon.polyshot.json.description: Your tool will behave like a shotgun when fired, shooting multiple projectiles with extreme damage falloff.

moretcon.polyshot_projectile.json.flavorText: brooo what are you doing with this?!?!?
moretcon.polyshot_projectile.json.description: Your projectile will behave as described in polyshot.

moretcon.pulsating.json.description: Your tool deals a bit of extra damage. This bonus fluctuates from high damage to low damage and then back to high.

moretcon.pulsating_armor.json.description: Your armor will have some amount of damage reduction. This bonus fluctuates from high to low and then back to high.

moretcon.pyrophoric.json.flavorText: Warning: Exposure to oxygen may have adverse consequences
moretcon.pyrophoric.json.description: Your tool will randomly ignite, granting fire damage as well as an overall boost to the tool.

moretcon.receptive1.json.description: Your tool will grow and adapt to what you use it for.

moretcon.reforgeagile.json.flavorText:
Light as air, sharp as intent.
Your tool will gain the following bonuses: +10% speed, and +3% critical chance.

moretcon.reforgeannoying.json.flavorText:
It always seems to fail at the worst time.
Your tool will gain the following bonuses: -15% speed, and -20% damage.

moretcon.reforgeawful.json.flavorText:
It feels wrong in your hands.
Your ranged tools will gain the following bonuses: -15% damage, -10% velocity, and -10% knockback.

moretcon.reforgeawkward.json.flavorText:
Unbalanced and clumsy to handle.
Your ranged tools will gain the following bonuses: -10% speed, and -20% knockback.

moretcon.reforgebroken.json.flavorText:
A pitiful shell of its former glory.
Your tool will gain the following bonuses: -20% knockback, and -30% damage.

moretcon.reforgebulky.json.flavorText:
Heavy swings, but they sure do hit hard.
Your melee tools and projectiles will gain the following bonuses: +5% damage, -15% speed, +2% critical damage, and +10% knockback.

moretcon.reforgeconsistant.json.flavorText:
Consistancy is key
Your tool will gain stacking bonuses while repeatedly mining the same block type or attacking the same mob type, up to a bonus of 50% extra damage and 2.5 extra mining speed.

moretcon.reforgedamaged.json.flavorText:
Itâ€™s seen better days.
Your tool will gain the following bonuses: -15% damage.

moretcon.reforgedangerous.json.flavorText:
It feels like it could turn on you at any second.
Your melee tools and projectiles will gain the following bonuses: +5% damage, +2% critical chance, and +1.25% critical damage.

moretcon.reforgedeadly.json.flavorText:
Every strike lands with lethal precision.
Your tool will gain the following bonuses: +10% speed, +10% damage, and +3% critical chance.

moretcon.reforgedemonic.json.flavorText:
It whispers promises of destruction.
Your tool will gain the following bonuses: +15% damage, +5% critical chance.

moretcon.reforgedmall.json.flavorText:
Compact and unimpressive.
Your melee tools and projectiles will gain the following bonuses: -2% critical damage.

moretcon.reforgedull.json.flavorText:
You could barely cut butter with this.
Your melee tools and projectiles will gain the following bonuses: -15% damage.

moretcon.reforged_projectile.json.description: Your projectile will gain stat bonuses of any ranged reforges on your launcher.

moretcon.reforgefatal.json.flavorText:
Every shot loosed feels like a death sentence.
Your ranged tools will gain the following bonuses: +10% damage, +5% speed, +2% critical chance, +5% velocity, and +5% knockback.

moretcon.reforgeforceful.json.flavorText:
You can feel the weight behind every strike.
Your tool will gain the following bonuses: +15% knockback.

moretcon.reforgefrenzying.json.flavorText:
You fire faster than you can think.
Your ranged tools will gain the following bonuses: -15% damage, and +15% speed.

moretcon.reforgegodly.json.flavorText:
Power flows through it like divine wrath.
Your tool will gain the following bonuses: +15% damage, +5% critical chance, and +15% knockback.

moretcon.reforgehasty.json.flavorText:
Quick to draw, quicker to strike.
Your ranged tools will gain the following bonuses: +10% speed, and +15% velocity.

moretcon.reforgeheavy.json.flavorText:
Do you even lift??
Your tool will be 15% more effective in terms of damage and mining speed, at the cost of 15% less movement speed and swing speed.

moretcon.reforgehurtful.json.flavorText:
It hungers for impact.
Your tool will gain the following bonuses: +10% damage.

moretcon.reforgeintimidating.json.flavorText:
Enemies flinch before the shot is even fired.
Your ranged tools will gain the following bonuses: +15% knockback, and +5% velocity.

moretcon.reforgekeen.json.flavorText:
Sharpened to a fine, hungry edge.
Your tool will gain the following bonuses: +3% critical chance.

moretcon.reforgelarge.json.flavorText:
Bigger doesnâ€™t always mean better, but it looks impressive.
Your melee tools and projectiles will gain the following bonuses: +2.5% critical damage.

moretcon.reforgelazy.json.flavorText:
It canâ€™t quite be bothered to perform.
Your tool will gain the following bonuses: -7.5% speed.

moretcon.reforgelegendary.json.flavorText:
A weapon of renown, said to never miss its mark.
Your melee tools and projectiles will gain the following bonuses: +15% damage, +10% speed, +5% critical chance, +2.5% critical damage, and +15% knockback.

moretcon.reforgelethargic.json.flavorText:
Each shot drags through the air like molasses.
Your ranged tools will gain the following bonuses: -15% speed, and -10% velocity.

moretcon.reforgelightweight.json.flavorText:
Fast as a feather, but lacks impact.
Your melee tools and projectiles will gain the following bonuses: +15% speed, and -10% knockback.

moretcon.reforgemassive.json.flavorText:
Its sheer size gives it terrifying momentum.
Your melee tools and projectiles will gain the following bonuses: +5% critical damage.

moretcon.reforgemurderous.json.flavorText:
It yearns for the thrill of the kill.
Your tool will gain the following bonuses: +6% speed, +7% damage, and +3% critical chance.

moretcon.reforgenasty.json.flavorText:
It bites quick and hard.
Your tool will gain the following bonuses: +10% speed, and +5% damage.

moretcon.reforgenimble.json.flavorText:
It darts like a shadow in motion.
Your tool will gain the following bonuses: +5% speed, +2% critical chance, and -10% knockback.

moretcon.reforgepointy.json.flavorText:
Itâ€™s got a real stabby personality.
Your melee tools and projectiles will gain the following bonuses: +10% damage.

moretcon.reforgepowerful.json.flavorText:
Each shot feels like it could pierce the heavens.
Your ranged tools will gain the following bonuses: +15% damage, -10% speed, and +1% critical chance.

moretcon.reforgequick.json.flavorText:
Swift and sure, ready to strike first.
Your tool will gain the following bonuses: +10% speed.

moretcon.reforgerapid.json.flavorText:
It hums with barely contained energy.
Your ranged tools will gain the following bonuses: +15% speed, and +10% velocity.

moretcon.reforgeruthless.json.flavorText:
Mercy is not in its nature.
Your tool will gain the following bonuses: +17.5% damage, and -10% knockback.

moretcon.reforgesavage.json.flavorText:
It tears through enemies with primal fury.
Your melee tools and projectiles will gain the following bonuses: +10% damage, +10% knockback, and +4% critical damage.

moretcon.reforgeshameful.json.flavorText:
Youâ€™d rather not be seen using it.
Your melee tools and projectiles will gain the following bonuses: -15% damage, -20% knockback, and +20% critical damage.

moretcon.reforgesharp.json.flavorText:
So sharp it practically cuts the air.
Your melee tools and projectiles will gain the following bonuses: +15% damage.

moretcon.reforgesharpened.json.flavorText:
ow, I cut myself :c
Your tool will gain a 20% bonus to damage and mining speed when above 95% durability, and a 10% bonus otherwise.

moretcon.reforgeshoddy.json.flavorText:
Barely held together with rust and regret.
Your tool will gain the following bonuses: -15% knockback, and -10% damage.

moretcon.reforgesighted.json.flavorText:
Its aim feels unnaturally precise.
Your ranged tools will gain the following bonuses: +10% damage, and +3% critical chance.

moretcon.reforgeslow.json.flavorText:
It moves at a snailâ€™s pace.
Your tool will gain the following bonuses: -15% speed.

moretcon.reforgesluggish.json.flavorText:
Every swing feels like itâ€™s underwater.
Your tool will gain the following bonuses: -20% speed.

moretcon.reforgestaunch.json.flavorText:
Sturdy and reliable, every shot counts.
Your ranged tools will gain the following bonuses: +10% damage, and +15% knockback.

moretcon.reforgestrong.json.flavorText:
Strength hums through its frame.
Your tool will gain the following bonuses: +15% knockback.

moretcon.reforgesuperior.json.flavorText:
Every part of it screams perfection.
Your tool will gain the following bonuses: +3% critical chance, +10% damage, and +10% knockback.

moretcon.reforgeterrible.json.flavorText:
A swing so weak, itâ€™s almost embarrassing.
Your melee tools and projectiles will gain the following bonuses: -15% damage, -2.5% critical damage, and -12% knockback.

moretcon.reforgetiny.json.flavorText:
Small, but not in a good way.
Your melee tools and projectiles will gain the following bonuses: -5% critical damage.

moretcon.reforgeunhappy.json.flavorText:
Itâ€™s just not in the mood to fight.
Your melee tools and projectiles will gain the following bonuses: -10% knockback, -2.5% critical damage, and -10% speed.

moretcon.reforgeunpleasant.json.flavorText:
It bites back in unpredictable ways.
Your tool will gain the following bonuses: +5% damage, and +15% knockback.

moretcon.reforgeunreal.json.flavorText:
A perfect blend of power, speed, and precision.
Your ranged tools will gain the following bonuses: +15% damage, +10% speed, +5% critical chance, +10% velocity, and +15% knockback.

moretcon.reforgeweak.json.flavorText:
It feels like it could snap at any moment.
Your tool will gain the following bonuses: -20% knockback.

moretcon.reforgeweighted.json.flavorText:
Perfectly balanced, as all things should beâ€”sort of.
Your melee tools and projectiles will gain the following bonuses: -10% speed, and +15% knockback.

moretcon.reforgezealous.json.flavorText:
Fueled by unyielding conviction.
Your tool will gain the following bonuses: +5% critical chance.

moretcon.resilient.json.description: Your tool is more resilient to damage, but when it prevents damage it slows down a bit. Deals extra damage while its slowed down.

moretcon.ricoshot.json.description: Your projectile will bounce off of surfaces and home onto nearby targets. Deals additional damage depending on number of bounces.

moretcon.sapping_armor.json.description: You heal a small fraction of damage nearby entities take while wearing this armor.

moretcon.saturpigting.json.description: Your tool will not only taste better, but also be more fulfilling and saturating when eaten.

moretcon.searing1.json.description: Your tool mines meltable blocks such as stone and metal ores faster.

moretcon.searing2.json.description: Your tool mines meltable blocks such as stone and metal ores faster.

moretcon.seismishock.json.description: Your tool emit a shockwave that deal massive AOE damage when dishing out a critical hit. Damage and area scales with players fall distance.

moretcon.serrated_armor.json.flavorText: Slice and dice!nYour armor will cause attackers to bleed when worn.

moretcon.shielding.json.description: Your tool provides +4 armor when held or worn on an armor slot.

moretcon.shock_aura.json.description: Your bomb will leave behind a damaging aura.

moretcon.slicing.json.description: Your tool can cause deep cuts in victims, causing them to bleed out.

moretcon.slimesharp.json.description: Your tool loves overslime, granting a damage and mining speed bonus depending on the amount of remaining overslime.

moretcon.soulforged1.json.flavorText: hippity hoppity your soul is now my property
moretcon.soulforged1.json.description: Your tool can boost its own effectiveness using the souls of its slain enemies.

moretcon.soulforged2.json.flavorText: hippity hoppity your soul is now my property
moretcon.soulforged2.json.description: Your tool can boost its own effectiveness using the souls of its slain enemies.

moretcon.stormcaller.json.description: Your tool will call down lightning during rain, granting a massive overall boost.

moretcon.supercritical1.json.description: Your tool's critical hits will have a higher crit modifier.

moretcon.supercritical2.json.description: Your tool's critical hits will have a higher crit modifier.

moretcon.trichromatic.json.description: Your tool will do different things in different chunks depending on the chunk's color affinity.

moretcon.tripleshot.json.description: Your tool shoots three projectile at a time, but has a longer cooldown.

moretcon.unmeltable_armor.json.description: You will gain temporary fire resistance while wearing this armor.

moretcon.voidic.json.description: Your tool hits harder and rapidly repairs itself near the void. If worn, it also gains additional defense.

moretcon.warped_echo_armor.json.description: While wearing this armor, incoming damage will be split into multiple sources.

moretcon.weightless.json.description: Your tool can be swung extremely fast.

moretcon.weightless_armor.json.description: ...as if you could walk on a cloud...

moretcon.withered.json.description: Your tool will apply stacking wither every hit.

moretcon.woeful_armor.json.description: Your armor will occasionally apply wither to your attacker.

night_vision_armor.json.description: You can see in the dark.

parasitic_armor.json.description: Your armor will feed off you to repair itself.

petramor.json.flavorText: So much stone, must see it all!
petramor.json.description: Your tool loves stone, it literally wants to absorb it (for durability).

petravidity_armor.json.flavorText: So much stone, must see it all!
petravidity_armor.json.description: Your armor loves stone, it operates better around it.

potion_belt_armor.json.description: Gives you a special potion storage.

powerful_armor.json.flavorText: This hand of mine is burning red...ish white!

prickly.json.description: Nobody is safe from those thorns, they always hurt.

prideful_armor.json.description: You're tougher after getting attacked, at the cost of durability.

raging1.json.description: Your tool does more damage the lower your health is.

raging2.json.description: Your tool does more damage the lower your health is.

reinforced_armor.json.description: Each level adds a 20% chance to not use durability.

rough_armor.json.description: Damages attackers on contact based on durability.

sharp.json.description: Hitting an enemy leaves them bleeding for a short time.

shocking.json.description: Running around, breaking blocks or hitting things charges your tool. Hitting an enemy discharges it, dealing damage and providing a speed boost. Mining a block discharges it, giving a mining speed boost.

soul_sight_armor.json.description: You can see the souls of nearby creatures.

spiky.json.description: Blocking and getting hurt deals damage to the attacker.

spiny_armor.json.description: Getting hurt deals damage to the attacker at the cost of durability.

splintering.json.description: Hit them more to deal more damage.

splitting.json.description: The sudden acceleration of releasing an arrow might cause it to split into two.

squeaky.json.description: Your tool is so soft and squeaky it gained silktouch, but deals no damage.

steady_armor.json.description: Less knockback for you, more for your attacker.

sticky_armor.json.flavorText: Get it off, get it off!
sticky_armor.json.description: Slows down anyone who attacks you.

stiff.json.description: Blocking reduces the damage taken even more.

stonebound.json.description: The tool mines faster as it wears out, but does less damage.

subterranean_armor.json.description: Your armor is more durable below sea level.

superheat.json.description: Deal bonus damage to enemies on fire.

superhot_armor.json.description: You run faster when you're on fire!

tasty.json.description: Smells so good.. You'd rather eat your tool than starve.

tasty_armor.json.description: Smells so good...You'd rather eat your armor than starve.

thermalinversion.json.description: Hitting an enemy in a hot or cold environment will chill or burn them.

travel_goggles_armor.json.description: You can zoom in on far sights.

travel_sack_armor.json.description: Gives you a second storage space.

unnatural.json.description: The tool mines faster the higher its mining level is above the required one.

vengeful_armor.json.description: Your attackers might not feel great after hitting you.

voltaic_armor.json.description: Getting hit charges your armor. Once fully charged, get hit again to discharge and deal damage to all surrounding creatures.

writable1.json.description: More words. More Modifiers. It's only logical!

writable2.json.description: More words. More Modifiers. It's only logical!
